headline: Mark Cuban Says 'It's Interesting' The Trump Administration Quietly Offered A Form Of UBI Through HSA Contributions, And 'No One Noticed' It
summary: Billionaire entrepreneur Mark Cuban believes the government may have slipped in a version of universal basic income without anyone realizing it. And he thinks it came through an unexpected path: Health savings accounts. Cuban Sees Hidden UBI in Trump-Era HSA Expansion “I think it’s interesting that the [Trump] administration offered a UBI program, hidden behind direct HSA contributions, and no one noticed,” Cuban wrote in a post on X recently.
